replaceAll.name: Replace Default Status Effects
replaceAll.hint: Replace all default Foundry status effects with Dragonbane-themed effects. Dragonbane and YZE Combat will add their own effects separately. Requires reload.

showSpellEffects.name: Show Spell Effects
showSpellEffects.hint: Include spell-related status effects in the available effects list. Requires reload.

showHeroicAbilities.name: Show Heroic Abilities
showHeroicAbilities.hint: Include Heroic Ability status effects in the available effects list. Requires reload.

enableTokenHudStyling.name: Enhanced Token HUD Layout
enableTokenHudStyling.hint: Enable 6-column grid layout with section headers for the token HUD status effects. Disable if you prefer the default Foundry layout or want to use custom CSS.

customStatusEffects.name: Custom Status Effects (JSON)
customStatusEffects.hint: Define custom status effects as JSON array. Example: [{'id':'my-effect','name':'My Effect','img':'icons/svg/example.svg','category':'general'}]. Valid categories: general, spell, ability

descriptionEditor.name: Edit Status Effect Descriptions
descriptionEditor.hint: Open the description editor to add custom descriptions to status effects. Useful for modules like Visual Active Effects.
descriptionEditor.label: Open Description Editor

settings.reloadRequired: Setting changed. Please reload the world for changes to take effect.

editor.title: Status Effect Description Editor
editor.instructions: Add custom descriptions to your status effects. These descriptions will be used by Visual Active Effects and other modules that display status effect information. You can drag items, actors, or journal entries from Foundry directly into the description fields to create clickable links. Note: After saving, existing effects on tokens need to be removed and reapplied to show the new descriptions.
editor.placeholder: Enter a description for this status effect... You can also drag items, spells, or journal entries here to create links.
editor.reapplyEffects: Remove and reapply existing effects to tokens to see updated descriptions.
editor.resetComplete: Descriptions reset to last saved state.
editor.resetContent: This will discard any unsaved changes and reload the last saved descriptions. Are you sure?
editor.clearAllContent: This will permanently delete all status effect descriptions. Are you sure you want to continue?

errors.systemRequired: Dragonbane Status Effects | This module requires the Dragonbane system.
errors.invalidFormat: Custom Status Effects: Invalid format - must be an array of effects
errors.invalidJSON: Custom Status Effects: Invalid JSON format

warnings.systemCompatibility: Dragonbane Status Effects module is designed for the Dragonbane system. Some status effects may not work as expected.

notifications.customEffectsCleared: Custom effects cleared. Reload the world to apply changes.

EFFECT._comment: Status effect names - some may use DoD.* keys in future if added to core Dragonbane
